title: GOLD 5 - LF Ranked 5 team.
body:
LF an existing ranked team to join that is quite active. I play any roles but adc. Currently in gold 5 as mentioned in title. Use skype and teamspeak.
Casual or serious-ish team.

Yeah, well.... that's it really.

IGN: Fostwolf77, message here (might/might not see) or just add me in game. 
Here's a cookie   {{item:2010}}

replies.body:
Add me demonsiayer

I have a gold 5 ranked team and we looking for members! Hopefully tonight we should get some games going
